Ventrilo for OS X!

Posted on Sunday, November 20, 2005

Yay! Ventrilo for OS X has been released! This is huge! Ventrilo has become the standard Voice over IP (VoIP) application in the online gaming world. This means I will now be able to chat with other players, we'll be bale to stay more organized and have more fun!
